approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description. The description field should accept a minimum of 1 character and a maximum of 255 characters.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. The list should display the task description.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load within 3 seconds on a standard internet connection (e.g., 10 Mbps download speed) on a modern browser (e.g., Chrome, Firefox).

requirements.title: Secure Data Storage
requirements.description: The application shall store user data (task descriptions) securely, protecting against unauthorized access. This includes encryption of sensitive data at rest and in transit.
